title: Shadowed poster grotesque ID
content:
Anyone know what this might be? Can’t find anything even vaguely similar.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [soupe2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091124175106/http:/typophile.com/files/soupe2.jpg) | 109.3 KB |

comments.content:
This might have started as Franklin Gothic or News Gothic.

- Lex
Franklin was my first thought, but I couldn’t find a weight that worked right even after arcing. I’ll give News Gothic a try, thanks.
